abilities.name: Primal Winds
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Basic Pokémon's attacks cost {C} more.

attacks.name: Wild Dive GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
